title: Per-Session-Type Scrollback Configuration
description: Support per-session-type buffer sizes instead of global-only scrollback. Enable configuration like: scrollback: { orchestrator: 50000, worker: 500, default: 1000 }. Also support runtime override at spawn time via <ccmux:spawn scrollback="10000"> directive.
user_impact: Enables fine-grained memory management for multi-agent orchestration scenarios where orchestrator sessions need large scrollback buffers while ephemeral worker sessions need minimal memory footprint.
